title: Are avatar uploads broken?
content:
Over the last few days I have been trying to update my Typophile avatar photo, and the new photo is never visible. Is anyone else having this problem?

 [‹ On purchasing poetry by Bringhurst](http://web.archive.org/web/20080821142508/http:/www.typophile.com/node/35831 "Go to previous forum topic") [Legato & points ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080821142508/http:/www.typophile.com/node/7740 "Go to next forum topic")
author: James Puckett

comments.content: Although, your puppie dog is no longer showing.
